SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes
Interface Geometry

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Arc, CubicCurve, Ellipse, Line, Path, Polygon, Polyline, QuadraticCurve, Rectangle, RoundedRectangle
public interface Geometry
extends Cloneable, Serializable

Common abstraction over all geometric shapes.

Method Summary
 boolean contains(Point p)
          Returns whether the given Point is contained within this Geometry.
 boolean contains(Rectangle r)
          Returns true if the given Rectangle is contained within Geometry, false otherwise.
 Rectangle getBounds()
          Returns the smallest Rectangle fully enclosing this Geometry.
 Geometry getTransformed(AffineTransform t)
          Returns a new Geometry, which represents the given Geometry after the application of the given AffineTransform.
 boolean intersects(Rectangle r)
          Returns true if the input Rectangle intersects this Geometry, i.e. there is at least one common point.
 Path toPath()
          Converts this Geometry into a Path representation.
 

Method Detail

contains

boolean contains(Point p)
Returns whether the given Point is contained within this Geometry. This includes the case that the Point lies on the border of this Geometry.

Parameters:
p - The Point being tested for containment
Returns:
true if the Point is contained within this Geometry, false otherwise.

contains

boolean contains(Rectangle r)
Returns true if the given Rectangle is contained within Geometry, false otherwise.

Parameters:
r - The Rectangle to test
Returns:
true if the Rectangle is fully contained within this Geometry

getBounds

Rectangle getBounds()
Returns the smallest Rectangle fully enclosing this Geometry.

Returns:
A new Rectangle object that fully encloses this Geometry

getTransformed

Geometry getTransformed(AffineTransform t)
Returns a new Geometry, which represents the given Geometry after the application of the given AffineTransform. In case the AffineTransform may be performed type intrinsic (e.g. scaling on a Rectangle), an object of the same type is returned.

Parameters:
t - The AffineTransform to be applied
Returns:
A new Geometry object representing this Geometry after the application of the given AffineTransform.

intersects

boolean intersects(Rectangle r)
Returns true if the input Rectangle intersects this Geometry, i.e. there is at least one common point. This includes the case that the given rectangle is fully contained.

Parameters:
r - The Rectangle for the intersection test
Returns:
true if the input Rectangle and this Geometry have at least one common point.

toPath

Path toPath()
Converts this Geometry into a Path representation.

Returns:
A new Path representation for this Geometry.
